What's Poppin?

Hi, I’m Yunbin Bae. I was born in South Korea and have lived mainly in Seoul, a city filled with vigorous and vehement energy and constant changes. Perhaps that’s why I always seek inspiration and novelty— by learning new knowledge, adopting new skills, or seeking new experiences.


Double majoring in Sociology and American Culture during my undergraduate years, I have learned to articulate our experiences in alternative ways through (cross-)cultural and critical theory. Specifically, I focused on media studies— the relationship of media and its effect on marginalized communities, often looking through online communities where the marginalized people’s voices are usually best heard.


Designing creative strategies and implementing them have also been my joyful memories during my college years. The memories of winning the academia-corporation marketing strategy competitions or planning and strategizing diverse school activities as a member of student organizations spurred my passion for solving problems (either corporate or social problems) prevalent around us and our society.


With my previous studies and experiences in mind, I’m currently exploring the interaction between humans and technology. I will deepen my HCI research from upcoming March with the help of the Master of Science in Innovation at Yonsei University located in Seoul, South Korea.


In the near future, I want to contribute my knowledge and skills to a company whose end goal also concerns the betterment of our society. As much as I am aware of the dangers posed by technology, I confidently believe in technology’s power to connect our community and resolve structural disparity and oppression.


As much as I love energetic activities, including intense workouts at gym or riverside and traveling every unfamiliar places, I also adore mindfulness activities. I have been doing yoga and pilates since 2018, which helps me keep peace of mind. I love coffee in the morning — my favorite one is Vanilla Flat White not to mention Black Coffee. In my free time, I love sketching human's face, doing oil painting, listening to either loud or R&B and Soul music, and going to art galleries. To add more, I have recently started studying French, which is one of my 2022 resolutions!
